discovery.description: Research market, find gaps, score opportunities

validation.description: Validate demand, size market, define value prop

design.description: Define MVP, architecture, tech stack, criteria

graduation.discovery_to_validation: Top opportunity scored and selected with rationale
graduation.validation_to_design: Market size > $10M, demand signals confirmed, value prop defined
graduation.design_to_build: MVP scope locked, CRITERIA.md written, architecture documented
graduation.build_to_launch: All must-have criteria met, deployed to staging, tested
graduation.launch_to_mature: First paying users or clear path to monetization
graduation.mature_done: Product generates revenue independently with minimal intervention
